headline: Oil Prices Are Spiking. 3 Top Oil Stocks to Buy to Cash in on Higher Crude Prices.
summary: For better or worse, Devon Energy's financial performance is tied directly to oil prices.  Oil and gas giant ConocoPhillips is enhancing its ability to cash in on crude prices.  Higher oil prices are a boon for Chevron, which expects cash flows to rise.
